General.Name: Ostim Endustriyel Yatirimlar ve Isletme AS
General.Description: Ostim Endüstriyel Yatirimlar ve Isletme A.S. operates as a construction company in Turkey. It constructs substations, electromechanical and automation projects, power plants, sunflower oil plants, telecom projects, conveyor systems, steel tanks, plazas, complexes, steel tanks, finance and metro centers, techno parks, thermal projects, immovables, and housing and hospital facilities. The company is also involved in the construction of heavy construction equipment repair and maintenance centers; SME's industrial network, and oil and gas projects; and other construction activities, as well as foreign trade and aluminum injection activities. In addition, it offers concrete equipment and spare parts, rail systems, municipality equipment, and education and school equipment, as well as mechanical engineering services. Ostim Endüstriyel Yatirimlar ve Isletme A.S. was founded in 1998 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.

1.Name: Mr. Bünyamin  Kandazoglu
1.Title: Director of Admin. & Financial Affairs and Director of Real Estate
